description: Updates a previously created parallel data resource by importing a new input file from Amazon S3.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the parallel data resource being updated.

parameters.name: ParallelDataConfig
parameters.description: Specifies the format and S3 location of the parallel data input file. S3Uri (string) --- The URI of the Amazon S3 folder that contains the parallel data input file. The folder must be in the same Region as the API endpoint you are calling. Format (string) --- The format of the parallel data input file.

nested_params.name: S3Uri
nested_params.description: The URI of the Amazon S3 folder that contains the parallel data input file. The folder must be in the same Region as the API endpoint you are calling.

nested_params.name: Format
nested_params.description: The format of the parallel data input file.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request. This token is automatically generated when you use Amazon Translate through an AWS SDK. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the parallel data resource being updated.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the parallel data resource that you are attempting to update. Your update request is accepted only if this status is either ACTIVE or FAILED.

nested_items.name: LatestUpdateAttemptStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the parallel data update attempt. When the updated parallel data resource is ready for you to use, the status is ACTIVE.

nested_items.name: LatestUpdateAttemptAt
nested_items.description: The time that the most recent update was attempted.
